ygData.subject: (Transmission to Dollen)
ygData.msgSnippet: (A tight beam transmission emanates from behind the ENMP defense shield to Dollen) Welcome, friend! Please, for your safety, do not try to cross the field

(A tight beam transmission emanates from behind the ENMP defense shield to
Dollen)

"Welcome, friend! Please, for your safety, do not try to cross the field
prematurely. First we would like you, for our safety and the safety of our
other customers, to leave your weapons on the outside surface of the defense
field - they will remain suspended there until you return for them. After
you have done so, a five meter by five meter opening will appear. Please
then proceed to the camp site on the northern most point of the south
island, we will do business there." End transmission
